abstract: The group of Democratic lawmakers preparing to press the case against President Trump is about half as large as and far more diverse than the team that prosecuted President Bill Clinton.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON â€” All but one of them come with legal experience, whether gleaned from evening law courses or honed while winning the conviction of an F.B.I. agent who was seduced by a Soviet spy and traded secrets for cash and gold.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
